entry.title: keep domains on networksolutions, not continue their hosting and mailbox service
entry.content:
our hosting, domain, email service on networksolutions will be expired at the end of this month, the renew price is too much for us. explore infomations and make a reasonable choice.

Domain

keep domains on networksolutions, $11.99/year/domain(at the first time they offer us $40/year/domainğŸ˜‚).

Hosting

we only have one small website online at this moment, we decide not continue their hosting service. transfer it to my VPS or even github pages.

According to networksolutionâ€™s tuit, failed.

First, edit the A Records by selecting Edit A Records.

For the â€œ@ noneâ€ enter the following IP address 205.178.189.129(github ip: 192.30.252.153), clear the records for the â€œwwwâ€ and â€œ* (All others)â€, then select Continue

Second, edit the Host Aliases (CNAME records) by selecting Edit CNAME Records.

Enter â€œwwwâ€ in the Alias column. Leave TTL set to 7200 but on the same line, enter the name servers provided by the blogging service in the Other Host section (for blogger.com, this name server would be ghs.google.com)(change to: githubusername.github.io), failed.

according to tuit below on freedom, i changed githubusername.github.io to mydomain.com. after about one hour, it works.

according to this tuit on freedom, it works.

1. on freedom, add an A Record and a CNAME Record.

2. on github pages, add â€œwww.mydomain.com".

Email
